text: When ona bol them lead Zmluva Prayer (Salat) them let some z ona stand guard let them hold ich zbran let them stand ona ona prostrate Potom let inaksie zoskupit nie prayed berie ich turn praying ona chvila others stand guard hold ich zbran! Those disbelieved zelat see ona zanedbany tvoj zbran tvoj naradie v poradie zachvatit ona once i for all Ona nie commit omyl ona hampered dazo zranenie putting nadol tvoj zbran long mat rad ona zostat alert GOD chystat disbelievers shameful retribution
